pages.text: Roast a marshmallow on a stick over a campfire.

pages.title: How To Roast
pages.text: Marshmallows can be cooked through roasting over an open fire. Put a $(7)$(l)marshmallow$() on a $(#804a16)$(l)stick$() and hold it over a $(#d16500)$(l)campfire$() to roast to your desired level of toastiness. $(p)Toastiness Levels:$(li)warm $(li)toasted $(li)golden $(li)well done $(li)bunt $(li)scorched
